title: Did Trump Memo's manager explain how people wipe around sex?
subtitle: It is alleged that a federal memorandum stating that shelters for displaced persons can identify some new transgender residents on the basis of length and whether they have facial hair or Adam's apples.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: The Trump Administration issued a memorandum in July 2020 setting out the physical characteristics to be sought in order to identify transgender persons arriving in federally funded shelters for displaced persons.
